skillset.pro: Program Languages --> python, java, C, php

summary.exp: Having 4+ years of experience in training students in engineering colleges throughout Andhra Pradesh on various technologies Trained approximately 5000 students so far in short term & long term training programs Good in technical mentoring, code reviews to deliver quality output Involved in knowledge sharing and knowledge transfer to the new members of the team & Preparation of knowledge transfer documents Participated in trainings offered in order to increase technical skills, Got consistent & good feedback from every training program.
